name: Turret Jumper Wars!
description:
Turret Jumper Wars is a local multiplayer two-player brawl game that combines Super Smash Bros., Stickfight: The Game, and Mario Party and then adds the Turret Jumper mechanics. It has no relevance to the Turret Jumper story. Be the last one standing! Controls:

PLAYER 1:

A/D: Move

W: Jump/Walljump

E or Q: Shoot

PLAYER 2:

Left and Right arrow keys: Move

Up arrow key: Jump/Walljump

Slash (question mark): Shoot
